content: Southampton + Arsenal Wednesday + ThursdayFootball Prediction ContestGame 1:  Southampton v Brentfordhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/southampton-fc-v-brentford-fc-63fef34e901d0fa4f9574aa8Game 2:  Arsenal v Sportinghttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/uefa-europa-league/arsenal-fc-v-sporting-cp-640b28368e240124dbe182adRulesThis Prediction must be for both games1.  Predict the TOTAL combined amount of Corner Kicks + Offsides + Fouls in the match2.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores, VOID if no goals are scored)ExampleGame 1:  20, 60'Game 2:  20, 62'PrizesThe closest prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free BetIf you correctly predict the TOTAL combined amount of Corner Kicks + Offsides + Fouls in the match and successfully predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored, your Free Bet will be for  3 mbtc (Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
